keyword: how many calories in a chick fil a chicken biscuit
title: How Many Calories in a Chick-fil-A Chicken Biscuit?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for this breakfast menu item.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chick-fil-A Chicken Biscuit?
assumptions: Standard Chick-fil-A breakfast menu item: breaded chicken breast on a buttermilk biscuit, as served; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on official Chick-fil-A data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit contains about 460 calories with 17 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food info.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
What's the protein in a Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: About 17 g of protein from the chicken and biscuit.

faqs.q: Are Chick-fil-A chicken biscuits high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1190 mg sodium due to seasoning and breading.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: Roughly 46 g carbs, mostly from the biscuit.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: Opt for grilled chicken to reduce by ~100 kcal; skip add-ons.
